reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan's color looks perfect and appreciate its nice fit. However, the quality receives mixed feedback, with one customer describing it as rather cheap.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value
items.body: Nice fit. Not too tight or too skin tight. I usually wear a10 and ordered a large to layer over other shirts. Looks perfect. Nice thickness to fabric. Not too thin or scratchy. Color just a pictured. Perfect fall layering cardigan. Read more
items.author: Tess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Great fitting cardigan. Nice material. Enough stretch that it doesnâ€™t lose its shape but not clingy. Good size buttons. Perfect red. Bought in two colors. 5â€™7â€ 197 and large fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Ingrid

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit
items.body: Didn't particularly care for the material but overall a pretty sweater with a nice fit. Read more
items.author: KATHY F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5â€™2â€ too long.
items.body: Runs long? Nice sweater though Read more
items.author: John Chattin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mid weight and classic cardigan
items.body: This cardigan is very soft and fits beautifully. The quality is fantastic, the workmanship is excellent and the style is classic. This sweater is a piece of clothing you will have for many years and it will not go out of style. The knit on this sweater is mid-weight; itâ€™s perfect for 3 season wear. Spring and fall will always have either chilly days or evenings (or both) so this sweater is perfect for tossing over your t-shirt or tank top to keep the chill at bay. In winter, wear it with a long sleeve shirt or turtleneck underneath and you will certainly stay toasty warm. So 3 season use and styling that can be worn for years to come. Perfect piece that all gals should have in their closet for todayâ€™s style as well as many tomorrows. Read more
items.author: LeeLee

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Rather cheap looking
items.body: Synthetic fabric is quite cheap looking. Plan to return. Read more
items.author: Ann Chaney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pics Donâ€™t Do This Cardy Justice!
items.body: When this sweater arrived I shamelessly tore open the package like a monkey jumping on a banana â€¦ and I had not one second of regret. Itâ€™s beautiful! The knit is velvety soft (with no itchy tag) and perfect for layering over a cami or a tee, and the gray color has a heathered look to it for depth and subtle texture thatâ€™s hard to see in the product pics. As far as the weight of the knit goes thereâ€™s enough to drape nicely without being clingy, and it doesnâ€™t bulk you up. For reference, Iâ€™m a size 14 in Old Navy tops and I ordered an XL in this cardy to allow for layering â€” a good call! The everyday price point of this sweater is ridiculously amazing, and when you factor in frequently offered coupons, itâ€™s even more of a ridiculously amazing bargain. My favorite thing about this cardigan? You can wear it open and treat it like a blazer, or button it up and youâ€™ve got yourself a pull-over, level it up with slacks or a skirt, or dress it down with jeans and booties. In other words, this piece can easily be one of the most versatile pieces in your cool-weather wardrobe. ðŸðŸ’¨ ðŸ‚ðŸŒ§ï¸ ðŸ *** Because I rely so often on the reviews of others when I purchase on Amazon, I give my honest opinion about items such as this in the hope that youâ€™ll find it helpful, too. Read more
items.author: Quiltwench

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thinnest cardigan!
items.body: This sweater arrived vacuumed packed as flat as a pancake. I hoped it would fluff up after opening but it still feels incredibly thin. Like really thin. The button holes are not cut quite large enough and I felt like I was going to tear the knit as I was pushing the buttons through. Overall it looks cute on and it is soft, but the fit is boxy and itâ€™s probably the thinnest and lowest quality cardigan in this style Iâ€™ve ever owned. I didnâ€™t feel cute wearing it and it just felt cheap. Youâ€™re better off buying something from a box store. Read more
items.author: ML

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Block White Purple, Khaki Black Stripe, Black, White Black Stripe, Grey, Block Black White, Coffee Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
